caseTitle: Imran Khan v. Election Commission of Pakistan, etc
tagline: It is a matter of great concern that bye-elections of some legislators were conducted by the Election Commissioner although after the 18th Constitutional Amendment such elections were to be organized under Article 219(b) of the Constitution by the Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP). The notifications issued by ECP in respect of these legislators shall remain suspended till the time the rectification has not been obtained through a Constitutional Amendment.
